sense.def:
To pour a liquid
pomeni enakomerno prazniti tekočino ali drugo snov iz nagnjene posode.

seg.quote: The waiter poured the wine into her glass.
...a machine that poured grain into sacks.

sense.def:
To pour someone a drink
pomeni nekomu napolniti kozarec ali skodelico, da bo pil.

seg.quote: He poured Ellen a glass of wine.
She poured a drink for herself.

sense.def:
Kadar tekočina ali druga snov
pours somewhere
, nekam teče hitro in v veliki količini.

seg.quote: The rain poured through a hole in the roof.

sense.def:
To be pouring
pomeni, da močno dežuje.

seg.quote: In London it poured all the time.
It was absolutely pouring with rain.
Don't go out in the pouring rain.

sense.def:
Kadar ljudje
pour into a place
, nekam prihajajo v velikem številu.

seg.quote: Refugees are now pouring into this country.

sense.def:
To pour money into an activity or organization
pomeni porabiti veliko denarja za neko dejavnost ali organizacijo.

To pour out a drink
pomeni napolniti kozarec ali skodelico s pijačo.

seg.quote: Castle poured out two glasses of whisky.
